thread.title: Drake Sends Love Rihanna's Way On Her Birthday! Cue The Awwwws!
thread.title_full: Drake Sends Love Rihanna's Way On Her Birthday! Cue The Awwwws!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Drake Sends Love Rihanna's Way On Her Birthday! Cue The Awwwws!
text:
2/21/2017 9:03 AM ET | Filed under: MTV • Rihanna • Jennifer Lopez • Twitter • Drake • VMAs 
Drake may be the best ex EVER! 
On Monday, the Hotline Bling rapper gave his ex Rihanna a special shout out for her birthday during his Dublin concert and we're honestly still in tears about it. *Sniff* 
Photos: Take A Peek At Rihanna's Most Scandalous Outfits! 
As seen in fan videos (below) on Twitter , the Degrassi alum revealed he has a lot of "love" and "respect" for RiRi. Oh, and then he blasted their collaboration Work over the speakers and encouraged all of his fans to loudly sing along in honor of his former flame. 
"It's somebody's birthday today — somebody I have a lot of love for and a lot of respect for… So, instead of singing Happy Birthday , though, we just going to do this in Dublin. Instead of singing Happy Birthday , we're going to set it off just like this…" 
Drake Wishes Rihanna A Happy Birthday… pic.twitter.com/bypdxxBT7o
